DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_ABSTRACT: This study includes 30 paired samples of Korean Lung Cancer paitients. 30 Lung Cancer samples are paired with each normal(Saliva derived for control) sequencing data.The results of this WGS study were analyzed by Mutect and GATK for ranking germline variants and cancer variants to make mutational profile matrix.
DESCRIPTOR.STUDY_DESCRIPTION: This study includes 30 paired samples of Korean Lung Cancer paitients. 30 Lung Cancer samples are paired with each normal(Saliva derived for control) sequencing data.The results of this WGS study were analyzed by Mutect and GATK for ranking germline variants and cancer variants to make mutational profile matrix.
